articles.title: Struggling arts can bloom again if creatives survive - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The financial failure of Carriageworks offers a chilling warning of what the arts scene in a post-COVID-19 Sydney may look like.
articles.content: So this represents the much-vaunted Australian values for life in the time of COVID-19: footballers allowed to breach social distancing requirements and exempted from border closures, developers allowed untrammelled access without the usual controls, coal min… [+11224 chars]

articles.title: Foxtel's HBO deal will keep the company alive – for now - The New Daily
articles.description: Foxtel has lived to see another day, with the news it won a bidding war with Stan to hold onto the exclusive Australian rights for HBO content.
articles.content:
Foxtel has lived to see another day, with the news on Wednesday morning it won a bidding war with Stan to hold onto the exclusive Australian rights for HBO content.
